Description_lang: Hammers the current target for $53595sw1 Physical damage.$?s26573&s203785[Hammer of the Righteous also causes a wave of light that hits all other targets within $88263A1 yds for $88263sw1 Holy damage.]?s26573[While you are standing in your Consecration, Hammer of the Righteous also causes a wave of light that hits all other targets within $88263A1 yds for $88263sw1 Holy damage.][]|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $s2 Holy Power.

description_blz.en_US:
Hammers the current target for 509 Physical damage.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
description_blz.es_MX:
Golpea fuertemente al objetivo actual y le inflige 511 p. de daño físico.

Genera 1 p. de poder sagrado.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Martela o alvo atual, causando 521 de dano Físico.

Gera 1 de Poder Sagrado.
description_blz.de_DE:
Lässt einen Hammer auf das aktuelle Ziel niedergehen, der ihm 510 körperlichen Schaden zufügt.

Erzeugt 1 Heilige Kraft.
description_blz.en_GB:
Hammers the current target for 522 Physical damage.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
description_blz.es_ES:
Aporrea al objetivo actual y le inflige 515 p. de daño físico.

Genera 1 p. de poder sagrado.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Vous martelez la cible actuelle et lui infligez 525 points de dégâts physiques.

Génère 1 charge de puissance sacrée.
description_blz.it_IT:
Colpisce con un martello il bersaglio attuale, infliggendo 510 danni fisici.

Fornisce 1 carica di potere sacro.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Наносит текущей цели 524 ед. физического урона.

Дает 1 ед. энергии Света.
description_blz.ko_KR:
현재 대상을 망치로 강타하여 510의 물리 피해를 입힙니다.

신성한 힘 1개를 생성합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
錘擊當前目標，造成512點物理傷害。

產生1道聖能。
description_blz.zh_CN:
锤击当前目标，造成521点物理伤害。

产生1层神圣能量。
